text: melum nam avarukku palakaikalil, ovvoru visayam parriya nallupatecankalaiyum, (kattalaikalaiyum,) ovvonraip parriya vilakkankalaiyum eluti; "avarrai urutiyakap parrip pitippiraka! Innum um'mutaiya camukattarai avarril alakanavarrai etuttuk kollumaru kattalaiyituviraka! Aticikkiram pavikalin tankumitattai nan unkalukku kattuven" (enru kurinan)
